Alright drone #74, we don’t normally do this, but if you manage to pull this off, we’ll fast track your C-01 form to mate with the queen.
Workers #20 through #30 have given their lives for this intel. The giants of this realm use these metal discs to acquire, amongst other things, the sweet crystals.
Your job is to acquire several of these discs, place them next to the sign that worker #35 and #46 have set up to summon one of these giants and make a trade for the crystals.
There should be at least three of these discs nearby, Though the crystals might be worth ten.good luck! Over and out.
